verses.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Sing unto the LORD a new song, and his praise in the congregation of saints.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD! Sing a fresh song to the LORD — lift up his praise among the gathering of his faithful ones.

verses.kjv: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
verses.ct: Let Israel celebrate their Maker; let the people of Zion be filled with joy because of their King.

verses.kjv: Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.
verses.ct: Let them honor his name with dancing; let them make music to him with tambourines and harps.

verses.kjv: For the LORD taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.
verses.ct: Because the LORD delights in his people — he crowns the humble with salvation.

verses.kjv: Let the saints be joyful in glory: let them sing aloud upon their beds.
verses.ct: Let his faithful ones rejoice in his glory; let them shout for joy even from their beds.

verses.kjv: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, and a two-edged sword in their hand;
verses.ct: Let loud praises of God fill their mouths, and a double-edged sword be in their hands —

verses.kjv: To execute vengeance upon the heathen, and punishments upon the people;
verses.ct: to carry out justice on the nations and punishment on the peoples,

verses.kjv: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;
verses.ct: to put their kings in chains and their rulers in iron shackles,

verses.kjv: To execute upon them the judgment written: this honour have all his saints. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: to carry out the sentence already decreed against them. This is the honor given to all his faithful ones. Praise the LORD!
